jobs.title: Staff Software Engineer
jobs.blurb: Tech lead, owning large components of our ML data platform.
items: Wrote the uploading and processing framework used to index robot log data (text, image, sensors) and do downstream offline processing.
Lead development on the system that serves robot logs from cloud APIs to our robot visualization tool.
Worked cross functionally with Robotics at Google to drive org-wide platform adoptions.
Created our human annotation framework which drove our perception and RL projects. The system collected XX million human annotations.
Created systems to flexibly create fresh nightly training/evaluation datasets, which were used in multiple ML projects across Alphabet.
Lead development of the evaluation tools used daily by the perception team to asses model performance.
Wrote low-level systems code for logging and time synchronization, both on robot and in simulation.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.blurb: Tech Lead/Manager leading a small team of engineers and analysts on projects to increase customer happiness.
items: Led a team of 4 to implement a real-time AI assistant for customer service agents to help them answer customer questions.
Built a user activity services to detect customer presence for TV ad insertion.
Owned multiple other data pipelines consumed by analysts across Fiber.

jobs.title: Owner
jobs.blurb: Started my company Algorithm Shop where I did contract work across a variety of industries.
items: Built text classifiers for an online marketplace startup.
Implemented a database for querying structural and geometric attributes of proteins for a scientific software company.
Worked in Libya to build out a system for handling sensitive elections data for their 2014 elections on a UN project.
Built a proof of concept real-time aggregation framework for a smart-meter company.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.blurb: One of the initial members in the tech team for Obamaâ€™s 2012 reelection campaign.
items: Wrote a voter/donor record matching system to merge voters across databases to give a unified view of a voter for modeling, supporting both country-wide merges of all voters as well as a real-time service for single voter lookup.
Core member of "Project Narwhal", the campaigns primary organizing API. Created the systems for real-time metric reporting to let us understand the state of our field organizing operation.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.blurb: I interned in Google Books. As a full timer I worked on the Google Analytics Backend and AdWords Payment Fraud.
items: Wrote a matching system to surface links between a payment fraudster's closed accounts and their similar looking accounts that were still active.
Completed various signal engineering projects within the core "Risk Engine" used to detect payment fraud.
Wrote testing tools for the Google Analytics Backend team, both for large-scale diff-testing as well as for smaller scale unit testing.
In Google Books I worked on finding links where one book is quoting another. Listed as a co-inventor on patent US20090055389.
Coauthor of a FOCS paper  with James R. Lee
Researched particle filter approaches to WiFi based localization with Dieter Fox
Took graduate courses in algorithms, complex analysis, robotics, and complexity
TA for digital design (hardware), intro programming, and discrete mathematics
Worked on numerical modeling of stochastic processes with Stephen Rhode.
Took graduate courses in complex analysis
Studied math in Moscow for a semester
